author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two special weekend enrolment camps will be conducted on January 31 (Sunday) and February 6 (Saturday) at all polling stations to enable the newly eligible/left out persons to apply for enrolment and to make corrections/transposition of entries.

According to a release from the Chief Electoral Officer, the final electoral rolls of Special Summary Revision, 2016 were published on January 20. As per the directions of the Election Commission, the weekend enrolment camps are being held. The hard copy of the electoral roll pertaining to the part would be available at the camps for perusal of the public. The electoral rolls are also available in CEO’s website:http://elections.tn.gov.in

All eligible electors can visit the respective polling stations along with necessary documents. For the preparation of error-free electoral rolls, people have been asked to apply online.
title: Weekend enrolment camps
